intension: Design a Facebook cover image for Evangelist Catholic Church that showcases its religious beliefs and promotes community involvement. Include the church address and a bible verse, Jeremiah 29:11.
globalcaption: The image features a church with a large stained glass window, which is the main focus of the scene. The window is adorned with intricate designs, making it a beautiful and eye-catching element of the church. The church is located at 1400 Woodbury Church Road, and the stained glass window is positioned above the entrance.
keywords: religion, religious, belief, believe, pray, church, quote, catholic, facebook, cover, fb, evangelist

bglayer.bgcaption: The image features a white background with a gold cross prominently displayed in the center. The cross is adorned with a gold vine, adding an elegant touch to the design. The simplicity of the white background and the gold accents on the cross create a visually striking and minimalist appearance

objlayer.objcaption: The image features a large, ornate stained glass window with intricate designs. The window is situated next to a building, and it appears to be a prominent architectural feature. The stained glass window is predominantly green, with other colors also visible in its design. The window is positioned in the center of the image, drawing attention to its beauty and craftsmanship

body.text: For I know the plans I have for you,\u201d declares
